name: BBS.IO-TECH.fi Classic Dark Theme - Xenforo 2.1
description:
BBS.IO-TECH.fi Classic Dark Theme - Xenforo 2.1

Install stylus extension: Chromium based: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne?hl=en
Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/

Classic gray theme for bbs.io-tech.fi Xenforo 2.1 update. On the site select one of the dark themes as a base theme.
additional_info:
Classic gray theme

raw css also @https://gitlab.com/snippets/1937434
